                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <div style="width:100%; text-align: center">
<h1 style="display: block;margin: 0;padding: 0;color: #515154;font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 64px;font-style: normal;font-weight: bold;line-height: 100%;letter-spacing: -2px;text-align: center;"><strong><span style="color:#75bc43; font-size:65px; font-weight:400"><a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;"><img align="center" data-file-id="12933340" height="99" src="https://mcusercontent.com/87b417143812e027ea0de28cd/images/16d8e4f2-1a1a-49e9-93cc-7a4c6cec684d.png" style="border: 0px initial;width: 275px;height: 99px;margin: 0px;outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;" width="275"></a></span></strong></h1>

    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
			<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
				<tbody>
					<tr>
						<td align="center" style="vertical-align: middle;line-height: 18px;font-family: tahoma,helvetica neue,helvetica,arial,sans-serif;color: #515154;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;"><span style="font-size:20px"><span style="font-family:tahoma,verdana,segoe,sans-serif">A daily newsletter by</span></span>&nbsp;<a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;"><img alt="Spotlight PA" data-file-id="850345" height="34" src="https://mcusercontent.com/87b417143812e027ea0de28cd/images/119e3439-5c01-42f0-b617-5fd34cbeae6d.png" style="vertical-align: bottom;border: 0px;width: 150px;height: 0px;padding-bottom: 0px;outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;" width="80"></a></td>
					</tr>
				</tbody>
			</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if mso]>
				</tr>
				</table>
				<![endif]-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <div style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size:12px"><span style="font-family:open sans,helvetica neue,helvetica,arial,sans-serif"><strong>Your Postmaster: <a href="mailto:newsletters@spotlightpa.org" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">Colin Deppen</a></strong></span><br>
May 24, 2021</span></div>

                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>

				<![endif]-->

        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <em>Election audit, gift reveal, relief tracker, disaster plan, historical fiction, PSERS push, and did you win the lottery?&nbsp;It's Monday. Welcome to the week.</em>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if mso]>
				</tr>
				</table>
				<![endif]-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if mso]>
				</tr>
				</table>
				<![endif]-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <span style="font-size:26px"><strong>TOTAL RECOUNT</strong></span>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if mso]>
				</tr>
				</table>
				<![endif]-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnDividerBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;table-layout: fixed !important;">
    <tbody class="mcnDividerBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="min-width: 100%;padding: 0px 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                <table class="mcnDividerContent" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="min-width: 100%;border-top: 6px solid #75BC43;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        <td style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                            <span></span>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
<!--            
                <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="padding: 18px;">
                <hr class="mcnDividerContent" style="border-bottom-color:none; border-left-color:none; border-right-color:none; border-bottom-width:0; border-left-width:0; border-right-width:0; margin-top:0; margin-right:0; margin-bottom:0; margin-left:0;" />
-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            The company conducting an anonymously funded&nbsp;hand recount of 2.1 million Arizona&nbsp;ballots from last year's presidential election <a href="https://www.azmirror.com/2021/05/21/wake-technology-services-audited-a-pennsylvania-election-as-part-of-the-stopthesteal-movement/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">conducted an equally mysterious audit in one rural Pennsylvania</a><a href="https://www.azmirror.com/2021/05/21/wake-technology-services-audited-a-pennsylvania-election-as-part-of-the-stopthesteal-movement/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">&nbsp;county</a><a href="https://www.azmirror.com/2021/05/21/wake-technology-services-audited-a-pennsylvania-election-as-part-of-the-stopthesteal-movement/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">&nbsp;first</a>,&nbsp;the Arizona Mirror reports.<br>
<br>
Republican&nbsp;Pennsylvania state Sens. Doug Mastriano and Judy Ward asked Fulton County&nbsp;officials to allow the West Chester-based Wake Technology Services Inc. to conduct an audit of the county's 2020&nbsp;election, which local officials did.&nbsp;<br>
<br>
Mastriano, a prominent booster of meritless 2020 election fraud theories,&nbsp;did not respond to multiple messages from the&nbsp;Mirror, an online&nbsp;outlet&nbsp;launched with a progressive fund's backing. Ward said she passed&nbsp;along the audit&nbsp;request to Fulton County officials on Mastriano's behalf.&nbsp;<br>
<br>
The reporting provides new insight into some of the&nbsp;players and motives behind Arizona's contentious, chaotic,&nbsp;and highly secretive&nbsp;recount effort — one the Washington Post says <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/trump-false-claims-fallout/2021/05/19/87aeacc4-b7f9-11eb-a6b1-81296da0339b_story.html" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">has inspired similar pushes&nbsp;in communities nationwide</a>.<br>
<br>
But plenty of questions remain, including:
<ul>
	<li data-wahfont="15" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">Who paid for the Fulton County audit?&nbsp;(A&nbsp;county commissioner said he has no idea.)</li>
	<li data-wahfont="15" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">Why audit a county former President Donald Trump won by a 6-to-1 margin?</li>
	<li data-wahfont="15" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">And why is&nbsp;Wake Technology Services Inc., a tech&nbsp;company focused on the&nbsp;health-care sector, conducting election audits in the first place?</li>
</ul>

<p data-wahfont="15" style="margin: 10px 0;padding: 0;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;"><strong>THE CONTEXT: </strong>A state-run pilot audit of Pennsylvania's 2020 election results confirmed in March that President Joe Biden was rightly declared the winner here but, as is typical of the&nbsp;medium,&nbsp;<a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org/news/2021/03/pa-election-biden-trump-risk-limiting-audit-limitations/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">didn't&nbsp;reveal&nbsp;how well the election was administered on a county-by-county or precinct-level basis</a>, Spotlight PA and Votebeat found.<br>
<br>
Election oversight hearings were also convened in Harrisburg, with Republicans&nbsp;calling them&nbsp;a necessary endeavor post-2020 and&nbsp;Democrats a cover for voter suppression.&nbsp;<br>
<br>
Now, after&nbsp;six months of calling for changes to Pennsylvania’s Election Code, <a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org/news/2021/05/pa-primary-election-2021-how-it-went-issues-typical/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">Republicans are finally set to unveil their proposals</a>&nbsp;—&nbsp;stricter voter ID, earlier&nbsp;registration deadlines, and mandatory signature verification on mail ballots all possible.<br>
<br>
Meanwhile, State Sen. Ryan Aument (R., Lancaster) on Friday announced <a href="https://twitter.com/chwolfson/status/1396124327741898755" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">he'll be</a><a href="https://twitter.com/chwolfson/status/1396124327741898755" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">&nbsp;introducing&nbsp;legislation</a><a href="https://twitter.com/chwolfson/status/1396124327741898755" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;"> to suspend no-excuse mail ballots</a>, which&nbsp;he and other Republicans supported&nbsp;in 2019.<br>
<br>
<strong>» Love PA Post? Learn something today?</strong> <a href="http://checkout.fundjournalism.org/memberform?org_id=spotlightpa&amp;campaign=701f40000003ZQxAAM" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;"><span style="color:#ea5b3c">Pay it forward and </span></a><a href="http://checkout.fundjournalism.org/memberform?org_id=spotlightpa&amp;campaign=701f40000003ZQxAAM" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;"><span style="color:#ea5b3c">support Spotlight PA now</span></a><span style="color:#ea5b3c"><a href="http://checkout.fundjournalism.org/memberform?org_id=spotlightpa&amp;campaign=701f40000003ZQxAAM" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">&nbsp;so we can keep providing this vital public service »»</a></span></p>

                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if mso]>
				</tr>
				</table>
				<![endif]-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnImageBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnImageBlockOuter">
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" style="padding: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" class="mcnImageBlockInner">
                    <table align="left" width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="mcnImageContentContainer" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                        <tbody><tr>
                            <td class="mcnImageContent" valign="top" style="padding-right: 9px;padding-left: 9px;padding-top: 0;padding-bottom: 0;text-align: center;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                                
                                    <a href="http://checkout.fundjournalism.org/memberform?org_id=spotlightpa&amp;campaign=701f40000003ZQxAAM" title="" class="" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                                        <img align="center" alt="" src="https://mcusercontent.com/77370ff1d001f9bb991fed9e7/images/c1083ba9-7f37-aec0-20d6-89f96d035d47.png" width="300" style="max-width: 300px;padding-bottom: 0;display: inline !important;vertical-align: bottom;border: 0;height: auto;outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;" class="mcnImage">
                                    </a>
                                
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </tbody></table>
                </td>
            </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <div dir="ltr">
<div dir="ltr"><span style="font-family:helvetica neue,helvetica,arial,verdana,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:16px">NOTABLE / QUOTABLE</span></strong></span><br>
<br>
"It will reinforce our own, I hope, recognition of the responsibility that we have to ensure that law enforcement in Pennsylvania isn’t like law enforcement in some other states."<br>
<br>
<em>—Citizen Advisory Commission member Beth Pittinger on the&nbsp;commission's <a href="https://www.witf.org/2021/05/20/citizen-group-is-set-to-begin-reviewing-state-police-use-of-force-and-racial-bias-incidents/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">pending review of State Police use-of-force and racial bias incidents</a></em></div>
</div>

                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if mso]>
				</tr>
				</table>
				<![endif]-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnDividerBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;table-layout: fixed !important;">
    <tbody class="mcnDividerBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="min-width: 100%;padding: 5px 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                <table class="mcnDividerContent" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="min-width: 100%;border-top: 2px none #EAEAEA;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        <td style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                            <span></span>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
<!--            
                <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="padding: 18px;">
                <hr class="mcnDividerContent" style="border-bottom-color:none; border-left-color:none; border-right-color:none; border-bottom-width:0; border-left-width:0; border-right-width:0; margin-top:0; margin-right:0; margin-bottom:0; margin-left:0;" />
-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnBoxedTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <!--[if gte mso 9]>
	<table align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
	<![endif]-->
	<tbody class="mcnBoxedTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnBoxedTextBlockInner" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                
				<!--[if gte mso 9]>
				<td align="center" valign="top" ">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" class="mcnBoxedTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td style="padding-top: 9px;padding-left: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-right: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                        
                            <table border="0" cellspacing="0" class="mcnTextContentContainer" width="100%" style="min-width: 100% !important;border: 3px solid #89D085;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                                <tbody><tr>
                                    <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding: 18px;color: #222222;font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;font-weight: normal;text-align: center;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;line-height: 125%;">
                                        <div style="text-align: left;"><strong>VACCINE UPDATE: </strong>Fully vaccinated Americans who have been&nbsp;exposed to&nbsp;COVID-19 but who are asymptomatic themselves&nbsp;<a href="https://apnews.com/article/coronavirus-pandemic-education-business-science-health-6e197fa0858a71a6339259bf84c35453" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">can largely skip getting tested for the virus now, the CDC says</a>. The CDC is also&nbsp;probing a small number of&nbsp;reported cases of <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/05/22/health/cdc-heart-teens-vaccination.html" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">heart problems in teenagers and young adults who have received the shots</a>, per the New York Times.&nbsp;For vaccine providers, use <a href="https://www.vaccines.gov/search/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">the federal government's online tool</a>,&nbsp;call <a href="https://www.wesa.fm/2021-05-09/to-bridge-the-digital-divide-biden-administration-launches-vaccine-hotline" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">1-800-232-0233</a>, or text&nbsp;your zip code to 438829 (GETVAX).

                                    </div></td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody></table>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if gte mso 9]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if gte mso 9]>
                </tr>
                </table>
				<![endif]-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>

              	<!--[if mso]>

                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            Wheatland is a 19th century home located in Lancaster County once owned by James Buchanan, the 15th president of the U.S. Thanks, <strong>Anne C.</strong>,<strong>&nbsp;</strong>for the photo!&nbsp;<strong><a href="mailto:ypiper@spotlightpa.org?subject=PA%20Gem%20Submission" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">Send us</a></strong>&nbsp;your hidden gems, use the hashtag #PAGems on Instagram, or tag us at <strong><a data-saferedirecturl="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://spotlightpa.us15.list-manage.com/track/click?u%3D77370ff1d001f9bb991fed9e7%26id%3Dcd946f7a0d%26e%3Debfd0c4eb5&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1604542294010000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHY52tozAkW8gTW1YJxays7lzc_uQ" href="https://spotlightpa.us15.list-manage.com/track/click?u=77370ff1d001f9bb991fed9e7&amp;id=cd946f7a0d&amp;e=ebfd0c4eb5" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">@spotlightpennsylvania</a></strong>.
                        </td>
                    </tr>

    <tbody class="mcnDividerBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="min-width: 100%;padding: 0px 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                <table class="mcnDividerContent" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="min-width: 100%;border-top: 6px solid #75BC43;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        <td style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                            <span></span>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
<!--            
                <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="padding: 18px;">
                <hr class="mcnDividerContent" style="border-bottom-color:none; border-left-color:none; border-right-color:none; border-bottom-width:0; border-left-width:0; border-right-width:0; margin-top:0; margin-right:0; margin-bottom:0; margin-left:0;" />
-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding: 0px 18px 9px;text-align: left;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;">
                        
                            <strong><img align="left" data-file-id="12932624" height="66" src="https://mcusercontent.com/87b417143812e027ea0de28cd/images/56e00e5a-9aa0-4ac1-a9ca-f2fbf1eaaa20.png" style="border: 0px initial;width: 30px;height: 66px;margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px;outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;" width="30"></strong>

<p style="text-align: left;margin: 10px 0;padding: 0;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;"><strong>GIFT BAN:&nbsp;</strong>For many state lawmakers, 2020 was a banner year for staying home — and eschewing people bearing gifts, at least according to their limited disclosure forms. Pennsylvania is in the&nbsp;minority of states&nbsp;with no limit on the size or number of gifts elected officials can accept. <a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org/news/2021/05/pa-legislature-lawmakers-gifts-disclosure-ban/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">A</a><a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org/news/2021/05/pa-legislature-lawmakers-gifts-disclosure-ban/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">&nbsp;renewed&nbsp;effort is pushing&nbsp;to change that by banning legislator gifts altogether</a>. History says it faces a&nbsp;steep climb, per Spotlight PA.<br>
<br>
<img align="left" data-file-id="12932636" height="66" src="https://mcusercontent.com/87b417143812e027ea0de28cd/images/97674993-b21b-448d-838a-d311cf102bbe.png" style="border: 0px;width: 30px;height: 66px;margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px;outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;" width="30"><strong>RELIEF REQUEST</strong>:<strong> </strong>Pennsylvania&nbsp;Auditor General Timothy DeFoor wants the authority and the money to hire <a href="https://www.cityandstatepa.com/content/republicans-float-spending-protections-federal-coronavirus-aid" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">private accounting firms to keep tabs on the $13.5 billion in federal aid state and local governments</a> will soon receive, via City &amp; State. Pennsylvania is set to receive its largest share of federal relief dollars yet through the American Rescue Plan, and&nbsp;DeFoor said it needs to be protected against waste and fraud.<br>
<br>
<img align="left" data-file-id="12932640" height="66" src="https://mcusercontent.com/87b417143812e027ea0de28cd/images/24282be3-5536-4f20-8e77-df76215990dc.png" style="border: 0px;width: 30px;height: 66px;margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px;outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;" width="30"><strong>CRISIS RESPONSE</strong>: Voters gave state lawmakers <a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org/news/2021/05/pa-primary-2021-ballot-question-disaster-declaration-results/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">new power last Tuesday</a> over&nbsp;a governor's disaster declarations,&nbsp;an ongoing&nbsp;pandemic order being front of mind for most. But the future of a&nbsp;years-old and still-urgent&nbsp;opioid epidemic-inspired declaration is also uncertain, with a GOP spokesperson&nbsp;telling Capital-Star that <a href="https://www.penncapital-star.com/government-politics/with-new-guidelines-for-emergency-response-how-will-pa-lawmakers-address-the-opioid-crisis/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">Republicans in the majority will work with Gov. Tom Wolf before deciding what to do</a>.<br>
<br>
<img align="left" data-file-id="12932628" height="66" src="https://mcusercontent.com/87b417143812e027ea0de28cd/images/8b19e7ba-9fc3-4fd6-9668-864daa6e800f.png" style="border: 0px;width: 30px;height: 66px;margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px;outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;" width="30"><strong>RECENT HISTORY</strong>:<strong> </strong>U.S. Rep. Scott Perry (R., Pa.) voted last week against a 9/11-style commission to study the Jan. 6 attack at the U.S. Capitol. Pressed by a C-SPAN&nbsp;caller, Perry downplayed the violence, saying there were "no arms that came in as far as I know, other than the people who were armed at the Capitol as security." <a href="https://www.witf.org/2021/05/20/midstate-congressman-downplays-events-of-january-6th-while-defending-vote-against-bipartisan-commission/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">WITF reports that's far from true, according to federal charging documents tied to the attack</a>.<br>
<br>
<img align="left" data-file-id="1951021" height="66" src="https://mcusercontent.com/77370ff1d001f9bb991fed9e7/images/b9e604ba-b2b8-eb95-68b4-31413acdaee0.png" style="border: 0px;width: 30px;height: 66px;margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px;outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;" width="30"><strong>STEP DOWN</strong>:<strong>&nbsp;</strong>A powerful union representing 36,000 Pennsylvania educators is <a href="https://www.post-gazette.com/news/state/2021/05/21/Teachers-union-demands-leadership-changes-at-embattled-PSERS-pension-fund/stories/202105210131" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">calling for the resignation of every Public School Employees Retirement System board member appointed</a> before January 2021,&nbsp;according to PennLive.&nbsp;The Pennsylvania chapter of the American Federation of Teachers says <a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org/news/2021/05/pa-fbi-pension-psers-investigation-subpoenas-properties-real-estate-harrisburg/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">scandals swirling around the $64 billion pension fund</a> have jeopardized the financial security of its members.</p>

                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if mso]>
				</tr>

        </tr>

</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <strong>SANTORUM SPLIT</strong>:<strong> </strong>Rick Santorum, a former U.S. senator from Pennsylvana, is now a former CNN&nbsp;political commentator, too, having been dropped by the network over <a href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/rick-santorum-cnn-native-americans_n_60a92fa6e4b0313547978140" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">ahistorical and revisionist comments about Native Americans and his subsequent a</a><a href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/rick-santorum-cnn-native-americans_n_60a92fa6e4b0313547978140" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">ttempt to explain the</a><a href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/rick-santorum-cnn-native-americans_n_60a92fa6e4b0313547978140" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">&nbsp;remarks</a>,&nbsp;HuffPost reports.<br>
<br>
<strong>NEW HOME</strong>: When Texas Sen. Ted Cruz recently lamented and politicized the "<a href="https://twitter.com/tedcruz/status/1395466833227038726?s=20" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">jack-hammering</a>" of a First Amendment monument at the former Newseum in D.C., fact-checkers and ratio-happy Twitterati were quick to note <a href="https://www.phillyvoice.com/first-amendment-tablet-philly-national-constitution-center-independence-mall/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">the monument wasn't actually destroyed but rather&nbsp;</a><a href="https://www.phillyvoice.com/first-amendment-tablet-philly-national-constitution-center-independence-mall/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">relocated to Philadelphia</a>.<br>
<br>
<strong>HUMAN TOUCH</strong>: Pitt bioengineers and a man who lost significant mobility in a car crash have created&nbsp;a robotic arm controlled by his brain. It used to only receive signals, but now it's <a href="https://www.wesa.fm/health-science-tech/2021-05-21/robot-arm-now-has-feelings-prosthetic-developed-by-pitt-researchers-generates-tactile-sensations" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">sending sensory touch information back and greatly increasing </a><a href="https://www.wesa.fm/health-science-tech/2021-05-21/robot-arm-now-has-feelings-prosthetic-developed-by-pitt-researchers-generates-tactile-sensations" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">the technology's effectiveness</a>, WESA reports.&nbsp;<br>
<br>
<strong>CHALK DAD</strong>: Westmoreland County dad <a href="https://www.thechalkingdad.com/gallery" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">Erik Greenawalt's</a>&nbsp;life-like, three-dimensional chalk drawings cover Dr. Seuss, "Schitt's Creek," Dwight Schrute, and more. Greenawalt is self-taught and told KDKA-TV about <a href="https://pittsburgh.cbslocal.com/video/5611546-westmoreland-co-man-goes-viral-for-chalk-drawings/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">his favorite works and the downside of being a chalk artist in a rainy </a><a href="https://pittsburgh.cbslocal.com/video/5611546-westmoreland-co-man-goes-viral-for-chalk-drawings/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">climate</a>.<br>
<br>
<strong>CASH MONEY</strong>: Someone in Pennsylvania <a href="https://philadelphia.cbslocal.com/2021/05/23/515-million-winning-mega-millions-ticket-sold-in-pennsylvania/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">won more than half a billion dollars o</a><a href="https://philadelphia.cbslocal.com/2021/05/23/515-million-winning-mega-millions-ticket-sold-in-pennsylvania/" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">ver the weekend</a>.&nbsp;It's unknown exactly where in Pennsylvania the winning $515 million lotto ticket was sold. I'll provide an update and my Venmo handle for the winner ASAP.
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
				<!--[if mso]>
				</td>
				<![endif]-->
                
				<!--[if mso]>
				</tr>
				</table>
				<![endif]-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnDividerBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;table-layout: fixed !important;">
    <tbody class="mcnDividerBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="min-width: 100%;padding: 5px 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                <table class="mcnDividerContent" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="min-width: 100%;border-top: 2px none #EAEAEA;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        <td style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                            <span></span>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>
<!--            
                <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="padding: 18px;">
                <hr class="mcnDividerContent" style="border-bottom-color:none; border-left-color:none; border-right-color:none; border-bottom-width:0; border-left-width:0; border-right-width:0; margin-top:0; margin-right:0; margin-bottom:0; margin-left:0;" />
-->
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" class="mcnTextBlock" style="min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <span style="font-size:26px"><strong>THE SCRAMBLER</strong></span>
                        </td>
                    </tr>

    <tbody class="mcnDividerBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td class="mcnDividerBlockInner" style="min-width: 100%;padding: 0px 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
                <table class="mcnDividerContent" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="min-width: 100%;border-top: 6px solid #75BC43;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">

                <table class="mcnDividerContent" style="min-width: 100%;border-top: 2px none #EAEAEA;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0">

    <tbody class="mcnTextBlockOuter">
        <tr>
            <td valign="top" class="mcnTextBlockInner" style="padding-top: 9px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">
              	<!--[if mso]>
				<table align="left" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="width:100%;">
				<tr>
				<![endif]-->
			    
				<!--[if mso]>
				<td valign="top" width="600" style="width:600px;">
				<![endif]-->
                <table align="left" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="max-width: 100%;min-width: 100%;border-collapse: collapse;mso-table-lspace: 0pt;mso-table-rspace: 0pt;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;" width="100%" class="mcnTextContentContainer">
                    <tbody><tr>
                        
                        <td valign="top" class="mcnTextContent" style="padding-top: 0;padding-right: 18px;padding-bottom: 9px;padding-left: 18px;mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;word-break: break-word;color: #3b3b3b;font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif;font-size: 16px;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">
                        
                            <div style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-family:helvetica neue,helvetica,arial,verdana,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:16px">Unscramble and send your answer to <a href="mailto:scrambler@spotlightpa.org" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #75bc43;font-weight: bold;text-decoration: underline;">scrambler@spotlightpa.org</a>. We'll shout out winners here, and one&nbsp;each week will get some Spotlight PA swag.</span></span><br>
&nbsp;</div>

<div style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size:24px"><font color="#75bc43" face="helvetica neue, helvetica, arial, verdana, sans-serif"><strong>E N S C T R I P E E S</strong></font></span></div>
<br>
<strong>Friday's answer: </strong>Interesting<br>
<br>
<strong>Congrats to our weekly winner: </strong>Brian B.<br>
<br>
<strong>And congrats to our daily winners: </strong>Becky C., Irene R.,&nbsp;Mary Ellen T., Barbara F.,&nbsp;Patricia R., Dixie S.,&nbsp;Susan D.,&nbsp;Elaine C.,&nbsp;Jill M.,&nbsp;Neal W., Mary H.,&nbsp;Yvette R.,&nbsp;Mike B.,&nbsp;Patricia M.,&nbsp;Diane P.,&nbsp;Beth T.,&nbsp;David I.,&nbsp;Maureen G.,&nbsp;Cris F.,&nbsp;Michelle T.,&nbsp;Elizabeth W.,&nbsp;Carol D., James B.,&nbsp;Tish M.,&nbsp;Adrien M.,&nbsp;Steve D.,&nbsp;Dennis M., George S.,&nbsp;Dianne K.,&nbsp;Doris B.,&nbsp;Heidi B.,&nbsp;Richard D., Johnny C.,&nbsp;Mary Kay M.,&nbsp;Jill A.,&nbsp;Don H.,&nbsp;Suzanne S.,&nbsp;Karen W.,&nbsp;Fred O.,&nbsp;Alice B.,&nbsp;Myles M.,&nbsp;David W.,&nbsp;Aaron T.,&nbsp;and Lex M.
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody></table>

                            <em><a href="https://www.spotlightpa.org" target="_blank" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly;-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;color: #FFFFFF;font-weight: normal;text-decoration: underline;">Spotlight PA</a> is an independent, non-partisan newsroom powered by The Philadelphia Inquirer in partnership with PennLive/The Patriot-News, TribLIVE/Pittsburgh Tribune-Review and WITF Public Media.<br>

You're receiving this email because you subscribed to PA Post, which has combined with Spotlight PA to create Pennsylvania's largest statewide newsroom dedicated to accountability journalism.</em><br>

    </body>    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.4.2/jquery.min.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">
            $(document).ready(function() {
                document.getElementById("copyToClipboard").addEventListener("click", function () {
                    var input = document.getElementById("clipboardSource");
                    input.select();
                    var successful = document.execCommand("copy");
                    if (successful) {
                        alert('Copied "' + input.value + '" to your clipboard.');
                    } else {
                        throw new Error("Failed to copy text (verify caller was in the context of an event handler)");
                    }
                });

                $('li.more > a').click(function(){
                    var toToggle = $($(this).attr('data-to-toggle'));
                    if(toToggle.is(':visible')){
                        toToggle.slideUp('fast');
                        $(this).removeClass('is-active');
                        if ($('#awesomebar').find('.is-active').length < 1){
                            $('#awesomebar').removeClass('sub-active');
                        }
                    } else {
                        toToggle.slideDown('fast');
                        $(this).addClass('is-active');
                        $('#awesomebar').addClass('sub-active');
                    }
                    return false;
                });

            });
        </script></body> </html>
